XML.STR: It has some rust here and there. Once bought and used, it is sure to be difficult to sell it to others.
It is somewhat rusty. It seems difficult to sell it to others once it is bought and used.
A dagger used in the military when making an assault.
A very light and easy-to-use Dagger.
A high-end dagger that is not from mass production. A beautiful pattern inscribed on the surface by a craftsman stands out. But it seems heavy.
It is a mysterious dagger said to have been used to kill an evil spirit. However, it is not sure whether it is true or not.
This dagger is used by a very few number of people. It is said that only a very limited number of this dagger has been produced.
Easily obtainable dagger. It was made in a factory. A faint serial number is visible on the surface.
Easily obtainable sword. It was made in a factory. A faint serial number is visible on the surface.
This sword is used in the military. It is said that this weapon is not supplied to the rank or file. It has quite a high-end appearance.
This sword is made of high-end materials for a special purposes.
It is a mysterious sword said to have been used to kill an evil spirit.
This renowned sword is gold plated. The attractive look of this sword makes the sword collector desperately want it.
Kodachi made in a way that it can be used by both hands. Made suitable for the general public.
Kodachi made in a way that it can be more easily used by both hands. It is relatively lighter and smaller than the normal one.
This Kodachi is made of high-end materials for special use.
This Kodachi with a scary name is said to have been used by a great swordsman of a long time ago.
This pistol has been used from a long time ago in the empire. Its production has been discontinued. Manufacturer: Walcom.
(Two-handed Weapon) This pistol has been used from a long time ago in the empire. Its production has been discontinued. Manufacturer: Walcom
It was developed to be supplied to the military. Its controlability has improved from the Raptor 80. Manufacturer: Walcom
(Two-handed Weapon) It was developed to be supplied to the military. Its control was improved compared with the Raptor 80. Manufacturer: Walcom
This legendary revolver was produced by Maxwell and supplied to the general infantry of the Republic. Its production is discontinued now.
(Two-handed Weapon) This legendary revolver was produced by Maxwell and supplied to the general infantry of the Republic. Its production is discontinued now.
This revolver was developed by Walcom to be supplied to the military.
(Two-handed Weapon) This Revolver was developed by Walcom to be supplied to the military.

A revised model of the Raptor 50. Its performance improved slightly but the appearance has not changed from the old version. Its production was announced to be stopped quite early as its competition released a new product. Manufacturer: Walcom
(Two-handed Weapon) A revised model of the Raptor 50. Its performance improved slightly but the appearance has not changed from the old version. Manufacturer: Walcom
This pistol was produced to be supplied to the battlefront of the Republic. Manufacturer: Maxwell
(Two-handed Weapon) This pistol was produced to be supplied to the battle front of the Republic. Manufacturer: Maxwell
The follow-up model of the Raven 5. It's performance has improved but its manufacturer failed to make it light. Manufacturer: Maxwell
(Two-handed Weapon) The follow-up model of the Raven 5. It's performance has improved but its manufacturer failed to make it light. Manufacturer: Maxwell
The follow-up model - Raptor 120. It has a more powerful performance and excellent repeat fire rate.
(Two-handed Weapon) Follow-up model of Raptor 120. It has a more powerful performance and excellent repeat fire rate.
This Raven 7 has reinforced fire power. It has more fire power and repeat fire rate. But it still has some drawbacks in terms of the control power and weight.
(Two-handed Weapon) This Raven 7 has reinforced fire power. It has better fire power and repeat fire rate. But it still has some drawbacks in terms of the control power and weight.
Raptor Series won confidence with a high firing accuracy. This weapon shows the advanced development capability of Walcom.
(Two-handed Weapon) Raptor Series won confidence with a high firing accuracy. This weapon shows the advanced development capability of Walcom.
The initial version of lightweight revolver of Canox. Its production is discontinued. Though it is not produced anymore, the second-hand Dynax is frequently transacted.
(Two-handed Weapon) The initial version of lightweight revolver of Canox. Its production is discontinued. Though it is no longer produced, the second-hand Dynax is frequently transacted.
This model was produced in order to commemorate the fifth anniversary of Maxwell's Minic. It has a higher safety and power than the original one.
(Two-handed Weapon) This model was produced in order to commemorate the fifth anniversary of Maxwell's Minic. It has a higher safety and power than the original one.
High-end revolver made by Nico. Its upgraded design drew keen attention.
(Two-handed Weapon) High-end revolver made by Nico. Its upgraded design drew keen attention.
Phantom Cruise's slightly upgraded model. Its performance has slightly improved.
(Two-handed Weapon) Phantom Cruise's minor upgraded model. Its performance has slightly improved.
Canox' Lightweight Revolver. As a follow-up model of Dynax 7000, its performance has remarkably improved.
(Two-handed Weapon) Canox' Lightweight Revolver. As a follow-up model of Dynax 7000, its performance has remarkably improved.
This model was produced in order to commemorate the fifth anniversary of Maxwell's Minic. It has a higher safety and power than the original one.
(Two-handed Weapon) This model was produced in order to commemorate the fifth anniversary of Maxwell's Minic. It has a higher safety and power than the original one.
The Zaurus Type B boasts strong power. It has better firing accuracy.
(Two-handed Weapon) The Zaurus Type B boasts strong power. It has better firing accuracy.
This old submachine gun produced by Canox has been used for a long time. Its production has been discontinued.
(Two-handed Weapon) This old submachine gun produced by Canox has been used for a long time. Its production has been discontinued.
This submachine gun produced by Walcom is quite popular with better fire power and better capacity to load more bullets.
(Two-handed Weapon) This submachine gun produced by Walcom is quite popular with better fire power and better capacity to load more bullets.
Canox's small submachine gun. This is manufactured with a focus on better portability.
(Two-handed Weapon) Canox's small submachine gun. This is manufactured with a focus on better portability.
Follow-up model of the once widely-popular Renard. It has better controllability and repeat fire rate.
(Two-handed Weapon) Follow-up model of the once widely popular Renard. It has better controllability and repeat fire rate.
Follow-up model of Walcom's S5. It has better fire power and stability compared with its previous model.
(Two-handed Weapon) Follow-up model of Walcom's S5. It has better fire power and stability compared with its previous model.
New version of the popular Renard V produced by Canox.
(Two-handed Weapon) New version of the popular Renard V produced by Canox.
This model was produced in order to commemorate the 70th anniversary of Walcom. It has a light-weight body and it is called 'the minor grade version of S6.'
(Two-handed Weapon) This model was produced in order to commemorate the 70th anniversary of Walcom. It has a light-weight body and it is called minor grade version of S6.
This new model was produced by Canox whose popularity was dented by Walcom XL.
(Two-handed Weapon) This new model was produced by Canox whose popularity was dented by Walcom XL.
New model produced by Walcom who attempted to take advantage of Walcom XL. Its only difference from the old model is better fire power.
(Two-handed Weapon) New model produced by Walcom who attempted to take advantage of Walcom XL. Its only difference from the old model is better fire power.
Pump action-type shotgun produced by Leonics that specializes in the production of shotguns for ages. Its production has been discontinued.
Pump action type shotgun produced by Leonics. Though produced a long time ago, it is still very popular.
Leonics' new shotgun that was released quite recently.
Leonics's 7th model adopted a new design different from the existing breaker series.
Shotgun introduced by Nico as a monumental product. This weapon has strong destructive power. It has a drawback - it can load a small number of bullets.
New shotgun produced by Leonics, which is quite famous for the breaker series of shotguns.
Avenger's follow-up model that took the adventurers by shock.
Rifle produced by Nico in early days.
One of the most popular rifles among the Republican army.
Produced by Walcom, it has the drawback of being difficult to use but it has relatively strong power.
Produced by Maxwell, this weapon has stable grip, good operability, and high repeat rate.
Follow-up model of popular R5 of Nico. With its improved fire power, it is popular among R5 maniacs.
(Discontinued Item) Rifle with a higher repeat rate than LX30. It has a stable grip with high accuracy.
Nico's new rifle with better fire power.
Is still not easy to use but this new product of Walcom is produced with a focus on stronger fire power.
It is so heavy that it is hard to carry but its power of repeated shooting maked the enemies shiver in fear.
K9 machine gun with upgraded power. Its powerful serial shooting speed and controllability earned it the name, 'Firepower of Horror'.
Nico's new machine gun with explosive power. Even just facing the MG-KX will make the enemy feel pain.
Rocket launcher of strong power produced by Walcom.
Rocket launcher produced by Maxwell. It has more number of bullets than Walcom's L series and better repeated shooting capability. However, fire power was sacrificed instead.
Walcom's Rocket Launcher. This slightly upgraded model of L1 has slightly better rocket power.
An upgraded version of RW-77. Though nothing has changed, it has better repeated shooting power.
Walcom's Rocket Launcher. With more bullets than L1, it has become more powerful weapon. It got lighter as well.
Rocket launcher made in early days by Maxwell. It does not have a strong power.
Men's running shirt produced by Ares, a supplier of military outfits.
Very active men's cotton shirt produced by Renaut Sports.
Men's Leather Coat produced by Venico
This leather-fabric jacket for men has good thermal insulation.
Quite fashionable and stylish men's trench coat produced by Miz, formal suit maker Ares Military Jacket A.
Military jacket that Ares produced to supply to the military.
Long wool coat produced by Vinz for men.
Men's shirt with flower patterns produced by Renaut for summer.
Cotton T-Shirt exclusively for women. This product is especially suitable for active women.
Urike Women's Leather Jacket quite popular with the elastic fabric.
Women's military vest, which ensures good sport activity and survival in a combat.
Women's coat with luxury look produced by L*.
Women's military jacket supplied by Rex.
Women's stylish long coat, a new product of Urike.
Women's flower patterned top for summer produced by Bics.
Miz men's leather gloves which are popular with comfortable and simple design.
Winter gloves that protect your hands from the wind and cold. For men.
Men's iron gloves with excellent defensive power designed to be used in combat.
Men's gloves that are made by Renaut for summer.
Leather gloves to protect from cold.
Women's iron gloves designed to be used in combat.
Women's iron gloves designed to be used in combat.
Men's trousers by Vinz with an emphasis on the excellent elasticity and good feel and touch.
Trousers presented by Renaut Sportswear for sportsmen.
Leather trousers in a sophisticated design. Using natural leather, they have a sleek and clean cut and sewing.
Venico's denim angle band trousers for men with unique touch and feel.
Military trousers that Ares supplies to the military.
Blue Jeans produced by Webs. Suitable for tough adventurers.
Men's swimming trousers for summer produced by Renaut.
Flex' women's trousers with excellent elasticity and good touch and feel.
(Discontinued Item) Blue jeans widely worn by all, young and old. For women.
Comfortable military trousers especially designed for female soldiers.
(Discontinued Item) Cotton trousers with luxurious touch that L* presents for special females.
Blue jeans widely worn by all, young and old. For women.
Women's Chamois trousers with good feel and touch produced by Vinz.
Cotton trousers (new) with luxurious touch that L* presents for special females.
Women's military trousers produced by Rex.
Stylish cotton trousers made by Urike. Added practical touch and stylish look using coarse fabric.
Women's swimming trousers for summer produced by Bics.
High-end shoes with comfortable touch for dynamic activity.
Casual shoes popular with a unique design
Made of sturdy leather, these shoes do not tear no matter how tough the terrain that they trod.
These heavy shoes are made for those who put great value on the defense power.
Very sturdy casual-looking shoes produced by Vinz.
Men's sandals for summer made by Renaut.
Artificial leather shoes with a plain touch and feel.
Combat shoes specially made for female soldiers by Rex.
High-class leather boots L* is very proud of
Though look heavy, these shoes are made for those who put great value to defensive power.
Leather shoes with unique touch and feel produced by Urike.
Women's Sandals for summer produced by Bics
This ring does not look so beautiful. It was produced by the mayor for commemoration.
This ring is said to have been supplied to some special combat forces famous in the legends.
This small ring seems to contain the wishes of the many people who longed for a return to home alive.
This ring was produced in order to cherish the memory of a brave commander who was killed in a battle.
This ring was produced in order to commemorate scientists who created a system named FMT. There is a faint signature of McField inscribed in the jewel.
It does not look beautiful, but calls for good luck. People who wear this ring feel that they are much lighter.
This ring is produced by TEAMI in order to commemorate the achievement that Emperor Altema made.
A pretty ring with a beautiful red jewel. It is said to give its wearer energy.
This ring was produced to commemorate the princess, Elia under the order of the Emperor Altema. This rings gives its wearer confidence.
This ring is said to have been made of the feather of a legendary bird. This makes its wearer feel much lighter.

This enables you to recover the physical strength. 3 units

Mace used by the Chief Goblin.
Wand used by the Chief Goblin.
Great Hammer used by Goblin the King.
(Event Item) Ring of apology. Drawback: a bit heavy.
(Event Item) Men's coat that only those adventurers who helped dispel the abnormal phenomena of the Astra world can wear.
(Event Item) Women's coat that only those adventurers who helped dispel the abnormal phenomena of the Astra world can wear.
(Event Item) Jackets for the operation staff.
(Event Item) Golden ring. The letter of 'My Precious' is inscribed inside.
(Event Item) Triagle shaped rice rolls wrapped by seaweed. They look yummy. It can help you recover HP and AP slightly at once.
An ambitious brand of Vinz, the Burning Tide Helmet for male. Its passionate outlook is impressive.
An ambitious brand of Vinz, the Burning Tide Helmet for male. Its passionate outlook is impressive.
A dagger in a unique shape designed by a legendary swordsman.
An odd dagger handed down from the ancient times.
(Available during a certain period only) Ridic's Dagger. This strange dagger raises AP for the person who wears it.
A light-weight practical sword for adventurers.
A sword in a unique shape designed by a legendary swordsman.
An odd sword handed down from the ancient times.
A pistol mainly used by novice adventurers.
(Available during a certain period only) Ridic hunter's pistol. This strange pistol raises AP for the person who wears it.
A pistol that the Republic's soldiers had used. It was named after their residence.
A pistol used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani, main city for outlaws.
Revolver that the Republic's soldiers had used. It was named after their residence.
Revolver used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani, main city for outlaws.
The most powerful revolver of its class developed mainly focussing on the power. It is difficult for beginners to use it due to slow rate of firing and strong recoil caused by reinforced power.
SMG mainly used by the novice adventurers. It seems that merchants remodel the Renard's Magazine illegally and then sell them in the market.
SMG that the Republic's soldiers had used. It was named after their residence.
SMG used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani, main city for outlaws.
Shotgun that the Republic's soldiers had used. It was named after their residence.
Shotgun used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani, main city for outlaws.
A unknown creator has developed the gun and was imported from forign countries. It looks a little bit too light as a weapon, but the gun has greate capability which comes from its light weight.
A shotgun with inhenced power from the Breaker seires. Rate of firing and stability are relatively decreased, thus it is hard to control this gun.
Rifle that the Republic's soldiers had used. It was named after their residence.
Rifle used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani, main city for outlaws.
A rifle focussed on the rate of firing and stability. Its stable and controllable recoil is excellent.
Machine Gun used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani, main city for outlaws.
Rocket used by Republic soldiers. It was named after their residence.
Rocket the Iron Crow used that dominated the city of outlaws, Havana.
A rocket designed focusing on balance. Its damage is somewhat sacrificed but clip capacity and delay have been improved.
Ares supplies this hat to the military. Perfect match for the Ares military outlook.
Ceremonial Dress Hat that the ranks of the Empire wear at important ceremonies.
A soft Hat exclusively for the Gunners' Heaven, a private organization at the Republic. It would look good on dark-colored coat.
An easy-to-wear men's head covering. It can also be used to disguise yourself at battlefield.
Men's Head Covering with no Pattern
A simple Men's Head Covering. It is sometimes used as fashion accessories as well.
Men's Head Covering with the Water Drop Pattern
A light and easy-to-wear men's head covering. There are cute water drop patterns embroidered on the red fabric.
Men's Head Covering with Star Pattern
Star patterned men's head covering with unique touch and feel.
A men's uniform hat for Eternal Blue, outlaw at the sea.
A light men's hat recommended for the novice adventurers and those who hate a heavy outfit and equipment.
A men's hat for Blue Whistle, called the headache of the Empire.
A hat for cool guys on a hot summer beach.

A part of men's special armor made of reinforced material. It protects feet from all damages.
(Limited Periodic Sale) A women's sports suit made to be used in a certain sport. It seems to generate great power when worn.
Female COS Military Officer Battle Shoes
A female military officer battle shoes with unknown nationality which is favored by military mania.
A ring with the symbol of the luck (clover) inside the crystal. Its wearer would see its maximum weight increase.

This ring said to have been given to the Iron Cavalry. You may understand why those magicians of the ancient times devised the ring of this mighty power when you consider the heavy weapons that they carry.
This ring is said to have been made for the Great Emperor of Ryswick. The person who wears this ring with mysterious power is affected by the strong power of the ancient magic.
Men's shoes recommended for the novice adventurers and those who hate a heavy outfit and equipment.
Men's shoes for Blue Whistle, called the headache of the Empire.
A delicious looking chocolate. Small amount of both HP and AP are healed at once when eated.
A pouch which can hold extra magazine. Holds two extra magazine clips.
A powerful super light weighted medical kit. Medical Kit MX-S1 heals almost twice more than MK series. (3 bundle pack)
A powerful super light weighted medical kit. Medical Kit MX-S2 heals almost twice more than MK series. (5 bundle pack)
A powerful super light weighted repair kit. Repair Kit MX-S1 heals almost twice more than MK series. (3 bundle pack)
A powerful super light weighted medical kit. Medical Kit MX-S2 heals almost twice more than MK series. (5 bundle pack)

A page torn out of a book. The faint print says page 25.
A page torn out of a book. The faint print says page 41.
A page torn out of a book. The faint print says page 65.
Mysterious Skull. It looks like it is a skull of a bird.
Mysterious Skull. Not identified, the owner of the skull seems to have had a big head.
Mysterious skull whose usage not identified.
Skull of Goblin. An inscription on one side says, 'Call for a new world.'
It looks like bones of a man. However, the size is equivalent to that of a dinosaur.
Raw meat of unknown animal. It seemed to have been used as food.
Cooked seasoned meat. Looks very delicious.
Very delicious looking steak. It must have been Monster's favorite.
Iron-made earrings for the tribe, Kobold. Humans cannot wear them.
Silver earrings for the tribe, Kobold. Humans cannot wear them.
Gold earrings for the tribe, Kobold. Humans cannot wear them.
Earrings made of special metal used by the King, Kobold. Humans cannot wear them.
A necklace worn by the trial chief of Goblin. It is highly doubtful whether humans can wear it.
Doll made in the shape of the skeleton of a soldier. The taste of the maker is highly doubtful.
This doll looks exactly like Kobold! Will children be happy to get this doll?
Just looks like Goblin! But it seems that it could be used for nothing.
Doll that just looks like the mischievous fairy, Pampow.
Cute doll shaped like rabbit. What is it for then?!
Stuffed animal that kids used to have on their bed. How come it is in this...?!
Kids may not want to have it on their bed. How come it is here... ?!
Fairy shown in dreams. It just looks like Pampow.
It just looks like Pampow. However, it looks dreary somehow.
Dictionary that is full of strange contents.
A strange book full of people's names, volume I. It is said to have come from hell.
A strange book full of people's names, volume II. It is said to have come from hell.
It is similar to one that the gun priests had.
It is similar to one that the gun priests had. But...
This is a pickax that is used in a stope. But where to mine with it?
This stone utters weird things from time to time. It can move, too.
Ice crystal that seems not to be melted by usual heat.
Gear that has been broken. It seems no one can use it again.
Gear that seems to have had some important function in a machine.
Scary ax that is used by the King, Goblin King. It is regretful that humans cannot use it.
A picture book containing the information about Goblin.
